item.title: OpenSearch Service
item.description: About OpenSearch Service is a fully managed service that makes it easy to deploy, secure Amazon OpenSearch Service is an open source, distributed search and analytics suite based on Elasticsearch. Documentation User Guide You can load streaming data from the following sources using AWS Lambda event handlers: Amazon S3 Amazon Kinesis Data Streams and Data Firehose Amazon DynamoDB Amazon CloudWatch AWS IoT Exposes three Elasticsearch logs through CloudWatch Logs: error logs. search slow logs â€“ These logs help fine tune the performance of any kind of search operation on Elasticsearch.
